whyUse.title: Why Use Our English Grammar Checker?
whyUse.description: Our English grammar checker is an advanced tool designed to help you write better English. Whether you're a student learning English, a professional writing business documents, or someone looking to improve their English writing skills, our tool provides comprehensive grammar checking and suggestions. As a reliable English grammar checker available online, we focus on providing accurate, context-aware corrections for all your English writing needs.

questions.question: Is this English grammar checker free to use?
questions.answer: Yes, our basic English grammar checker features are completely free to use.

questions.question: How accurate is the English grammar checker?
questions.answer: Our AI-powered English grammar checker is highly accurate and continuously improving through machine learning.

questions.question: Can your English grammar checker handle both American and British English?
questions.answer: Yes, our English grammar checker fully supports both American and British English variants and can be configured to check against either standard.

questions.question: What types of errors can your English grammar checker detect?
questions.answer: Our English grammar checker system detects grammar errors, spelling mistakes, punctuation errors, style inconsistencies, and commonly confused words.
